bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Etiological Agent. of a rather violent version of shu 暑 , summerheat, evil. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 34: 心藏神 而惡熱 , 若冒觸暑毒 , 蘊蓄於五臟 , 則陰陽不能升降 , 經絡不得宣通 , 故奄然 悶絕 , “The heart stores the spirits and has an aversion to heat. If it encounters the malicious in the form of summerheat poison , which collects in the five depots, then yin and yang [qi] are unable to rise and descend, and the conduits and network vessels are no longer passable. Hence there is sudden heart-pressure and cut-off”.
